summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of West 59th Street from 1st Avenue Northwest to 3rd Avenue Northwest; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 99504 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
